verbs.description: [ARG0: Americans] [V: viewing] [ARG1: the recent failed coup attempt in Turkey] [ARG2: as some exotic foreign news story] -- the latest , violent yet hardly unusual political development to occur in a region constantly beset by turmoil -- should pause to consider that the prospect of similar instability would not be unfathomable in this country if Donald Trump were to win the presidency .
